## Source: amazon-inspector (3e8fa924e1aabab970bfb7f4b014f4f210acc59d591128c45fb41c33e1e8f8c3)
The package ezviz-shop-mall was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (12c4e7dde74f07de46b50bef8c447721f5170cc0074cdfe9711da0706e8fe779)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ezviz-shop-mall' @ 2.2.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
